23601.title: The Citadel of Justice: Drawbridge
23601.description:
You have finally made your way through the winding streets of Ofcol, and
find yourself here, before the legendary Citadel of Justice, home to the
Enforcers of Law.  The Citadel is an enormous construct, towering over the
city.  The citadel is a fortified castle, with three large cylindrical
towers jutting out above the main building.  A small river runs here past
the road leading up to the main gates, which requires a drawbridge to cross.
The drawbridge is currently raised and you are standing just inside of it,
before the Main Gateway of the Citadel.  The drawbridge is lowered, oddly
allowing you free access to this supposedly "closed" house.

23602.title: Courtyard
23602.description:
This is a vast area between the Main Gateway and the Citadel.  Basically, the
courtyard is square, surrounded by walls on each side. The ground is padded
slightly with sawdust, and you can see some faded cart tracks skewing through
the dirt.  Currently the area appears abandoned.

23603.title: Altar of Law
23603.description:
You have now arrived in the heart of the Citadel of Justice, the Altar of
Law.  Once considered sacred by the now defunct Enforcers, this room is
rumored to still house the legendary Book of Law.  A grand, ancient pillar
stands in the middle of this white marble room.  The room is a perfect square,
constructed from the purest of white marble.  A golden dome serves as the
roof.  Repleat with windows, the roof reflects the sunlight that pours in,
making this entire room glow with a divine lustre.

23604.title: Enforcer Barracks
23604.description:
This is the area where agents of Enforcer once rested themselves after a
weary day of protecting Theran citizens.  Simple and austere, the barracks
are little more than bunk beds arranged as efficiently as possible down the
long rectangular room.  Wooden closets stand beside each set of beds providing
storage of personal items. You notice these cabinets have no locks.  A
testament to the trust these agents of law must have had for each other.

23605.title: Council Room
23605.description:
Like many rooms in the Citadel of Justice, this room is very simple and
elegantly decorated.  The council room is a large trapezoid shape with the
coats of arms of past Enforcer leaders lining the walls.  A gigantic table
sits in the center of the room with a large chair at the shorter of the two
parallel sides, awaiting the leader of enforcers.  Smaller chairs align the
other sides of the table, awaiting other special agents of Justice.

23606.title: Eastern Hallway
23606.description:
Wandering around the Citadel, you see rooms lining the corridor, closed off
from the hallway by heavy wooden doors.  You can just imagine hearing the
caustic arguements of lawyers and accused, seeking justice and mercy for the
crimes of others.  Westward you can see the main foyer of the Citadel, and
further east, you can see the end of the main hallway.

23607.title: Citadel of Justice: Main Foyer
23607.description:
The foyer is truly magnificent.  The room starts as a solid marble floor
which stretches a good distance into the heart of the Citadel.  Ironwood
columns erupt from this floor and reach the arched ceiling forming
butresses at the top.  Exits appear to be in all cardinal directions.
Menacing looking guards must surely have roamed these halls once.  However,
the citadel appears now largely abandoned, though you think you can make out
fresh footprints in the dust on the floor.  Up to the north, you see a radiant
room.  The south will take you into the courtyard of the Citadel, and to the
East and West appear to be long hallways.

23609.title: Eastern Corner
23609.description:
This is the junction of the eastern hallway and a hallway that leads
northward.  Looking at the archway in that direction, you see a simple brass
plate with the engraving "COUNCIL ROOM".  The hallway stretches back west, or
you can continue northward.

23610.title: Western Corner
23610.description:
You have arrived in a western corner of the Citadel.  To the north is what
appears to be a barracks of some sort.  It is abandoned, much like the rest
of the citadel.  However, there are signs that there has been recent activity
within the citadel.  You may take your rest to the north or continue down the
hallway to the east.

23624.title: Main Gateway of the Citadel
23624.description:
Standing here within the gateway into the main courtyard and building of
the citadel, you can't help but be overtaken with a feeling of complete
awe.  The building rises straight up before you and is topped with ramparts
and walkways that once allowed Enforcer guards to keep vigilant watch over
any who entered or left the edifice.  A portcullis looms above the gate,
waiting to be dropped should the need arise. A small guardpost stands just
within the gates.

23625.title: Western Hallway
23625.description:
You've now traversed into the main section of the west wing of the Citadel
of Justice.  Back east is the main foyer of the edifice.  A sign on the wall
points west and reads BARRACKS.
